string.name: provisional
string.comment:
provisional
This marker indicates a rating is provisional. This happens when the rating deviation is too high, and the player needs more games (typically) so we can be more sure on the rating.

resources.string: بازی های دارای امتیاز کافی برای ایجاد رتبه بندی قابل اعتماد انجام نشده است.
